value.name: Torrance arson suspect Asa Dolak killed at Madrona Middle School
value.description: According to investigators, Asa James Dolak was found hiding in a bathroom ... field where another confrontation happened, forcing police to open fire, officials said. He was pronounced dead ...

value.name: Torrance arson suspect sought for 2 residential fires
value.description: UPDATE: Arson suspect killed in police shoot-out at Middle School. Police say that shortly after midnight, Asa James Dolak set fire to an apartment on the 16700 block of Crenshaw Boulevard ...
